title: The Way Is Within: A Spiritual Journey
description: How do you find yourself? This inspiring book of simple truths is a result of the authorâ€™s personal 15 year journey to finding himself. He discovered that if you can find peace within yourself, you are at peace with everything.This book had a journey to the pages of the Oprah magazine. It was discovered by a book salesperson in small bookstore in California. He saw something special in the words, and sent it in to his publisher. From there, it ended up on the pages of the Oprah magazine in a featured article about Ron, his journey, and the the power of the mind.More recently, Oprah published some of Ron's quotes from The Way is Within in her book, Words That Matter. One of Oprah's favorite quotes, "Be at peace with yourself. If you are not at peace with yourself, you are at peace with nothing."
author: Ron W. Rathbun
